shylux.java.network

Class ConnectionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • shylux.java.network.ConnectionManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ConnectionManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The ConnectionManager starts a server on a specific port. When someone connects he will notify all INetworkListener attached to him.
    Author:
    Lukas Knoepfel

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConnectionManager

        public ConnectionManager()
        Starts ConnectionManager on default port.

      • ConnectionManager

        public ConnectionManager(int pPortNumber)
        Starts ConnectionManager on a different port. Creates a new thread for listening on the port.
        Parameters:
        pPortNumber - port on which the server should listen

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Creates server and listens on the port. Notifies attached listeners upon new connection.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops the Manager. By closing the socket, the thread will receive an exception and terminate itself.

      • connect

        public static Connection connect(java.lang.String pHost)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Connections to remote host on the default port.
        Parameters:
        pHost - hostname / ip of the remote host
        Returns:
        the new connection
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - yea yea networking..

      • connect

        public static Connection connect(java.lang.String pHost,
                 int pPortNumber)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Connects to remote host on specified port.
        Parameters:
        pHost - hostname / ip of the remote host
        pPortNumber - port number on the remote host
        Returns:
        the new connection
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - yea yea networking..

      • addNetworkListener

        public void addNetworkListener(INetworkListener pNet)
        Adds connection listener. All listener are notified if a new connection established.
        Parameters:
        pNet - connection listener

      • removeNetworkListener

        public void removeNetworkListener(INetworkListener pNet)
        Removes network listener from list. That listener wont receive notifications anymore.
        Parameters:
        pNet - Listener to remove.

      • clearNetworkListener

        public void clearNetworkListener()
        Clears listener list. Every listener gets removed and wont receive notifications anymore.
